episodes.synopsis: The Colonial fleet has finally located Earth but is startled by its primitive technology. Undercover teams head down to speed up scientific advances.
episodes.title: Earth: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Troy and Dillon's meeting with Dr. Mortinson hits a snag. Meanwhile, a rogue commander travels back in time to deliver technology to the Nazis.
episodes.title: Earth: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: After facing off with Xaviar in 1944, Troy, Dillon and Jamie Hamilton return to the present to contend with new threats to the mission.
episodes.title: Earth: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: When Cylons launch a surprise attack on the fleet's school ship, Dillon and Troy scramble to save the children and get them to their new home: Earth.
episodes.title: The Super Scouts (Part 1)

episodes.synopsis: Troy and Dillon face an unexpected crisis as the children adjust to life on Earth. Meanwhile, the local sheriff grows suspicious of the group.
episodes.title: The Super Scouts (Part 2)

episodes.synopsis: A cryptic mission leads Dillon and Troy into grave danger, while the children turn heads at a baseball camp with their unusual abilities.
episodes.title: Spaceball

episodes.synopsis: As a damaged Cylon ship plunges toward Earth, Troy and Dillon race to intercept it and discover that the Cylons have made a startling advancement.
episodes.title: The Night the Cylons Landed (Part 1)

episodes.synopsis: Dillon and Troy chase the humanoid Cylon through the streets of New York City to stop it from broadcasting Earth's location.
episodes.title: The Night the Cylons Landed (Part 2)

episodes.synopsis: After Cylons target the fleet's agricultural ships, Troy and Dillon team up with an embattled farmer on Earth to create a new food supply.
episodes.title: Space Croppers

episodes.synopsis: In a dream, Dr. Zee sees Starbuck crash-land on a planet, where he befriends a Cylon centurion and a mysterious woman who is about to give birth.
episodes.title: The Return of Starbuck

video.title: Galactica 1980
video.synopsis: The inhabitants of the renegade star fleet take action when they realize earthlings aren't advanced enough to help battle the Cyclons.
